hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Boomerang#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Serenade of Water#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Red Potion Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass# and #a Huge Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #an Ice Trap# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Water Temple Compass#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Boss Key# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #5# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Farore's Wind# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Boomerang Room Small Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions:^How did Medigoron get inside that hole, and how does he get out for the credits?

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of the Water Temple# and #a Heart Container#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
